Miami Street Interviews with Man from Comandos Libertad and Woman from FAC
Miami Street Interviews with Man from Comandos Libertad and Woman from FAC

In this video, Estela interviews two men on the street in Miami. They describe the work that they do to support Cuban exiles in the United States. Another woman joins the conversation and Estela asks them all to share their opinions on the relationship between the United States and Cuba. The woman reacts strongly to Estela's question and they continue to debate the two countries' relationship as well as things Cuba could do to improve quality of life for its citizens.
